TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content: Waiter! There is a magnetar in my soup!

That's the head from the batter mixer. Let me take that back to the kitchen for the chefs.

Waiter, there are ground up doritos in my soup!

You ordered the doritos locos clam chowder for a reason didn't you.

Waiter there's a ring in my soup, WILL YOU MARRY ME?!?

Um.... who are you again?

Waiter, there's a 2001: A Space Oddessy in my soup!

Silly thing, that's our soup-bowl-shaped TV monitor. Your soup is in the TV-shaped bowl.

Waitress!!! There's a rat in my soup, and it is making fun of me! >:-[

You should make fun of it for being in the soup.

Waiter, there is a(n) UFO (Unidentified Flying Object) in my soup!
Waiter, there's a face in my soup.

Really? Oh silly you! That's YOUR REFLECTION! How old are you, 4?

Waiter, there's a- 984999999999999999999999 ERROR

The corruption is spreading!

Waiter, there's a video-game bug hive in my soup!

Well, at least it doesn't affect real life Intercontinental Ballistic Missile nu.. oh God.

Waiter, there's a HAL 9000 in my soup and it's not letting me put my spoon in the soup.

Yea, that's the smart soup. If it's bothering you that much, I'll just hit it with this hammer

*smash*

Waiter, there's a recently fired time-travelling waiter in my soup! I think it's me when I will work here.

I hope he won't cause a temporal cold war...

Waiter, there is soup in my soup!

Of course there is you ordered the bloody soup.

Waiter, there's a Man O' War ship in my soup.

that's weird, we ran out of Man O' War ships yesterday, and there was to be a new shipment of them on Thursday

Waiter, theres a giant ball of hydrogen gas undergoing nuclear fusion in my soup

Don't worry, it's 149,600,000,000m deep in the soup. Shouldn't burn your tongue for another 5 billion years.

Waiter, there's ice in my soup! I asked for soup that's boiling!

Oh I'm sorry. it was to be at 4 billion degrees kelvin but the cook put it to 0 degrees kelvin.

Waiter, theres 2 magical unicorns saying "that I have to go to candy mountain" in my soup

I'm sorry, but I'm a brony. I take them around every, and accidentally put them in your soup. But that's an awesome crossover, do you agree?

Waiter, there's BUTNUTS in my soup!

Really? I thought you ordered them. It was a bit strange, but we cater to all sorts here, if you know what I mean.

Waiter, there's SOUP in my soup!

Of course, you ordered extra soupy.

Waiter!!! There's a duck swimming in my soup, and it's making goose noises! >:^[

(:V==

Well, eat it. You wanted the 'Wild Floating Bird Soup'

Waiter, there's a nuclear aerospike in my soup!

You ordered the "Atomic Flower" soup.

Waiter, there's a pewdiepie in my soup!

Quarantine all spores attached to it.

Waiter, there's a Mudkip in my soup!

Here's a pokeball.

Waiter! The Mudkip's cape is in my soup!
It floats a lot! Waiter! There is a tsar bomba in my soup!

Good thing this bowl is just a really tiny Portal incinerator.

Waiter! There's a in my soup!

(Just focus on his facecam)
